title: Debate Erupts as Uniswap’s Adams Accuses Citadel of Driving Aggressive SEC Oversight on DeFi
description: The tension between decentralized finance and traditional Wall Street players resurfaced this week after Uniswap founder Hayden Adams publicly accused Citadel Securities of influencing U.S. regulators to impose stricter rules on the DeFi sector. Related Readi…
content: The tension between decentralized finance and traditional Wall Street players resurfaced this week after Uniswap founder Hayden Adams publicly accused Citadel Securities of influencing U.S. regulator… [+3395 chars]
